title: skyskysky
author: skyskysky
content: Hey there! Happy to introduce fresh platform for tracking HYIP (ROI miners) projects, including investment-based games and other stuff. We've curated all the essential information to keep you informed and in the loop.orientier.oneKey features:✅ TVL tracking✅ Deposits/Withdrawals tracking✅ Comprehensive Project Insights, from social networks to referral bonus details✅ Real-time Updates – we promptly flag dead projects and remove them, ensuring you're always in the know. Plus, be the first to discover new projects!✅ Scam warnings with availability to report scam for everyone. We will review your report and will post it if we will come to same conclusion. Let's make DEFI safer!We just launched MVP and ofc there are plans for future:-A GitBook filled with invaluable information about the DEFI and HYIP world-Direct withdrawals from our platform (in case you can't do it via project website)-Our exclusive project reviews and recommendations-Developer tools for project owners-A revolutionary secret seature-Audit services-Broader project coverage, extending beyond the HYIP realmWEBSITE | TELEGRAM | CHAT  | TWITTER
